item.title: review my statistics
item.description: Multicollinearity what is multi-col-linearity the problem of having multi-col-linearity what cause the multi-col-linearity using the VIF Solve the multicollinearity muticollinearity is observation on the data when two or more variables are highly correlated with each other. makes the interpretation of the variable to the target variable hard. For example, one unit of increase on x1 will case xxx increase/decrease on target variable when multicollearity happens.
